Rarely, alpha or beta adrenergic antagonists make the psychotic reactions, allergic dermatitis, disulfiram-alcohol reaction more serious. Sensitisation peripheral neuritis, or hepatic cell damage can to alcohol continues 6-14 days after taking disulfiram, occur. Severe reactions can lead to confusion, even if in small amounts. cardiovascular collapse, and death. DO NOT use with alcohol, as reactions can be life-threatening or fatal.
